description:
Reentrancy in SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchImpl(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#718-742):
	External calls:
	- (seqMessageIndex,beforeAcc,delayedAcc,acc) = bridge.enqueueSequencerMessage(dataHash,afterDelayedMessagesRead,prevMessageCount,newMessageCount) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#733-735)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDelayedMessagesRead = afterDelayedMessagesRead (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#737)
	SequencerInbox.totalDelayedMessagesRead (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#67) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- SequencerInbox._setBufferConfig(BufferConfig) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#773-793)
	- SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchFromBlobsImpl(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#414-457)
	- SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchFromCalldataImpl(uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#459-498)
	- SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchImpl(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#718-742)
	- SequencerInbox.delayProofImpl(uint256,DelayProof) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#536-556)
	- SequencerInbox.forceInclusion(uint256,uint8,uint64[2],uint256,address,bytes32) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#273-330)
	- SequencerInbox.isDelayProofRequired(uint256) (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#558-565)
	- SequencerInbox.totalDelayedMessagesRead (src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#67)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchImpl(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L718-L742):
	External calls:
	- [(seqMessageIndex,beforeAcc,delayedAcc,acc) = bridge.enqueueSequencerMessage(dataHash,afterDelayedMessagesRead,prevMessageCount,newMessageCount)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L733-L735)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [totalDelayedMessagesRead = afterDelayedMessagesRead](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L737)
	[SequencerInbox.totalDelayedMessagesRead](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L67) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [SequencerInbox._setBufferConfig(BufferConfig)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L773-L793)
	- [SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchFromBlobsImpl(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L414-L457)
	- [SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchFromCalldataImpl(uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L459-L498)
	- [SequencerInbox.addSequencerL2BatchImpl(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L718-L742)
	- [SequencerInbox.delayProofImpl(uint256,DelayProof)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L536-L556)
	- [SequencerInbox.forceInclusion(uint256,uint8,uint64[2],uint256,address,bytes32)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L273-L330)
	- [SequencerInbox.isDelayProofRequired(uint256)](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L558-L565)
	- [SequencerInbox.totalDelayedMessagesRead](src/bridge/SequencerInbox.sol#L67)
